Package c482Inventory.modifyProduct

Class ModifyProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • c482Inventory.modifyProduct.ModifyProductController
  • public class ModifyProductController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all events within the ModifyProduct window.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addComponentButtonHandler()
      Adds the selected part from the Parts table to the new Product's associatedParts ObservableList.
      void closeWindowHandler()
      Closes the ModifyProduct window.
      void initialize()
      Sets the TableViews and gives functionality to the search field above the Part Table.
      void loadModifyProductFields​(Product product)
      Loads the text fields & fills the new Product's associatedParts ObservableList using data from the Product argument.
      boolean modifyProductButtonHandler()
      Checks product validity, sets the new Product's fields, updates the Product, and then closes the window.
      void removeComponentButtonHandler()
      Removes the selected part from the associatedParts ObservableList once confirmed via a dialog.
      boolean validateForm()
      Ensures fields are filled out & populated with valid data.

      • loadModifyProductFields

        public void loadModifyProductFields​(Product product)
        Loads the text fields & fills the new Product's associatedParts ObservableList using data from the Product argument.
        Parameters:
        product - product to be loaded and modified

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Sets the TableViews and gives functionality to the search field above the Part Table.

      • addComponentButtonHandler

        public void addComponentButtonHandler()
        Adds the selected part from the Parts table to the new Product's associatedParts ObservableList.

      • removeComponentButtonHandler

        public void removeComponentButtonHandler()
        Removes the selected part from the associatedParts ObservableList once confirmed via a dialog.

      • validateForm

        public boolean validateForm()
        Ensures fields are filled out & populated with valid data. Displays error messages when appropriate.
        Returns:
        boolean concerning whether product to be saved is valid

      • modifyProductButtonHandler

        public boolean modifyProductButtonHandler()
        Checks product validity, sets the new Product's fields, updates the Product, and then closes the window.

        RUNTIME ERROR
        productId was reset to 0 after being updated. productId was being assigned as the index value of the ObservableList array it was in. To remedy this, productId - 1000 is used to find the index instead of editing productId itself.
        Returns:
        boolean concerning whether the part was updated or not

      • closeWindowHandler

        public void closeWindowHandler()
        Closes the ModifyProduct window.
